medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient presented with cough and shortness of breath.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of cough and dyspnea began approximately 5 years prior to presentation, gradually worsening and prompting the patient to visit a nearby clinic. After a previous hospital visit, chest radiography indicated bilateral pleural effusion.
medical_history.social_history: The patient has a history of smoking 10 cigarettes per day for 60 years and no history of drinking alcohol.
